newsitem.title: USA: Dense-Pac names Levy as president.
newsitem.headline: Dense-Pac names Levy as president.

text.p: Dense-Pac Microsystems Inc said Tuesday it appointed Uri Levy as chief executive officer, president, and a director of the board.
Levy has served as president, chief operating officer and director of Centennial Technologies Inc, and as president of Centennial Capital Corp, a unit of Centennial Technologies.
Levy succeeds James Turner, who stepped down from his position as CEO and president.
Dense-Pac designs and makes proprietary computer chip stacking technologies that allows the company's government and commercial customers to pack huge amounts of memory into small spaces.
